name: egocentrism of Mao 1/3
description:
History are written by everyone can imagine is real, so who's the writer? I've left it blank for you

Full artistic freedom certain does not exist there today. So I've broken into 3 pieces, censored due to content of history’s most powerful autocracies.

I've engage and use different artworks from China, fusing from newspaper, magazines, propaganda posters, photographs, text, and found objects for the creation of the visually stunning and thought-provoking images. 

Mao ruled for 27 years as the chairman of the CCP from the establishment of the PRC in 1949 until his death in 1976. 

size of original piece: 104cm x 53cm
